texto: organization may be expected to submit a quality plan to the customer for each stage, prior to the start of that stage. 6.2 Implementation of the quality plan In the implementation of the quality plan, the organization should give consideration to the following issues. a) Distribution of the quality plan The quality plan should be distributed to all relevant people. Care should be taken to distinguish between copies that are distributed under document control provisions (to be updated as appropriate), and those that are supplied for information only. b) Training in the use of quality plans In some organizations, for example those engaged in project management, quality plans may be used as a
